html:
7.20.18  5:30 pm   why is everything falling

     sounds like you are cherry picking the data

7.20.18  4:56 pm   what are your thoughts on lakes

     they go great in a district

7.20.18  4:51 pm   How do you come up with the non-metrical ideas in your songs that relate to the videos they are associated with? Are they part of the song and you associate them with the video or are they a video idea you juxtapose onto the song?

     i'm not sure which ones you are talking about

      Also, did you know July is National Baked Bean Month?

     some nations celebrate them every month

7.20.18  4:06 pm   i have spent my recent years finding new and interesting ways to wear clothing; it's amazing how much the mass media tends to ignore the joy of discovery. any good discoveries you made recently? do you have any thoughts around clothing and the means of wearing?

     inside out

7.20.18  3:51 pm   Thoughts on communism?

     collect all 10 flavours

7.20.18  3:48 pm   why do you think so good on things that are supposed to be good when it's not so good whent it's bad because it's god

     seems like a nice twist

7.20.18  2:31 pm   how would you describe the last mountain you climbed

     friendly, or at least it seemed friendly after i climbed it

7.20.18  2:30 pm   what's your favourite pasta shape?

     /

7.20.18  2:29 pm   who is better you or John Travolta 

     he has more planes but i have more followers on twitter

7.20.18  2:13 pm   7.20.18  7:44 am what if there came a time when you made a song that you felt was weaker than 'got to know what's going on', might you consider using the time you would normally spend on making a video for this weaker song, making a video for gtkwgo instead?

     i would make the new one better

7.20.18  1:32 pm   how many pretzels could you eat in an hour i bet i could eat more than you

     0

7.20.18  12:51 pm   How do I stop being lazy?

     that all depends on what else you would rather be doing

7.20.18  12:22 pm   why did the list of things you want to say in the song "La de da de da de da de day oh" have "i heart satan" on it?

     to add a bit of spice to what may have been a dull moment

7.20.18  11:52 am   Have you ever made a religion, just for fun?

     sure

7.20.18  11:18 am   when do you answer these questions?

     at the stroke of midnight

7.20.18  10:54 am   are symbols valid expressions?

     oh hell yeah

7.20.18  10:51 am   is it ok to be gay

     you'll have to check with the cops

7.20.18  10:35 am   7.17.18  9:37 pm do you think going to music school is neccessary at all?

     that's none of my business really

7.20.18  9:45 am   Make a music video on 'tuesday' and release it on a Tuesday. It would make the world happier

     what complicates that strategy is that it takes more than 1 day to make a music video

7.20.18  9:34 am   Is there any deep meaning in your content?

     yes

7.20.18  9:08 am   Will you ever correct the type at the page which you enter after you ask a question?

     it is the way i want it

7.20.18  7:47 am   Hi i am an hater how are you

     pretty good

7.20.18  7:46 am   what are some of your favourite songs that you've written?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

7.20.18  7:44 am   when are you going to make a music video for "got to know what's going on"? She's got that sweet medium size. you have no excuses.

     my main excuse is making new songs instead

7.20.18  7:42 am   I keep asking questions here, but when I come later to check the answers, I realize I forgot what I asked. what should I do?

     click here to find out what it was

7.20.18  3:44 am   What would you like people to call you when talking to you?

     nothing. if someone is already talking to me they don't need to say my name, and if they do it sounds creepy, kind of like a bad sales person. does that makes sense, George?

7.20.18  3:35 am   the song song is really cool you should remake it

     that would be a good idea except i have to make other new songs instead

7.20.18  2:52 am   who or what do you think acts as america's conscience?

     anyone who lives there

     Or do you think it's all a pretence put on for the cameras?

     you can do it off camera as well

7.20.18  1:29 am   are you capable of talking with proper grammar and punctuation or do you not do it for the sake of not having to do it

     my priorities are communication and expression. which i think were supposed to be grammar's priorities too

7.20.18  12:39 am   what is your best joke?

     having good posture

7.20.18  12:15 am   what do i do when i feel like I need to accomplish something but i have no idea what to do 

     run somewhere

7.20.18  12:07 am   do you celebrate birthdays?

      i celebrate every day

7.19.18  11:46 pm   when making a video like hotewig does the old cliche of "it's the journey not the destination" still hold true?

     how about both

7.19.18  10:22 pm   What do you have against using capital letters?

     nothing

7.19.18  9:38 pm   Every time i try and write to write a song it comes out sounding stupid and worthless, but im worried that it might not be the case, as i think i am just discarding it for not being "perfect". What should i do?

     just keep moving and try to add a little bit more 'mischief.' try making one bad on purpose ..... try to set a new record for how bad a song has ever been. then i think you will start having fun

7.19.18  8:33 pm   (I asked before if you liked writing narratives and you said 'sure!') would you ever share your works?

     sure, i was thinking about making a website where i could put all my works. hopefully billwurtz dot com if that domain name is not already taken

     i would love to see what kind of writing style you have :] no pressure whatsoever i just like reading and i also like your stuff

     how about this song or this video

7.19.18  6:38 pm   what is a rejected oreo flavor you can come up with?

     curds and whey

7.19.18  5:57 pm   what is the point of jail time in your snail time video?

     punctuation/resolution/surprise

7.19.18  5:35 pm   How many ducks do you see daily

     just myself

7.19.18  5:08 pm   7.6.18 1:24 pm following this, could you make a song about every week or two?

     sure

      Any reason why you are not doing this?

     gotta do the video

7.19.18  4:41 pm   do you believe in the american dream?

     i believe in all kinds of dreams

7.19.18  4:26 pm   how do i use geopolitical strategy to assert a subtle but lasting influence on other nations in time of uncertainty ?

     don't play the pieces, play the board

7.19.18  3:43 pm   Where does the soul reside within us?

     everywhere we've had any influence

7.19.18  3:25 pm   i get easily confused with the fact that you can call the note F# either F# or Gb. why don't we just have it so each note has its own distinct name? so it goes ABCDEFGHIJKL instead of A Bb B C Db D Eb F F# G Ab.

i know im not the first person to think of this and obviously it would mess up the whole system we have right now but i still think it should be changed!

     i made a system like that many years ago, i decided F#, Ab, Bb is Q R S. and C# and Eb are J, K. i did it so i wouldn't have to forget the existing letters. i think it's a perfectly fine system but it fell into disuse because no one else was using it

7.19.18  3:13 pm   do you want to stream on twitch?

     yes

7.19.18  2:37 pm   what's updog?

     a close cousin of upfam and upbro

7.19.18  1:59 pm   why did my parents get divoriced

     the important question is why did they get married

7.19.18  1:51 pm   do you answer questions about old songs of yours?

     sure

7.19.18  1:46 pm   What's the point of having different keys in music, anyway? I never understood this.

     in case you want to make songs ... higher or lower?

7.19.18  1:26 pm   I see some similarity between your content and the children's show Mr. Roger's Neighborhood in that there is music that is deeply integrated into regular speech. What do you think about the show?

     the underscoring is world class and also largely improvised
